blurbText: A machine tournament is a competition between players to see who can get the highest score on a particular game or set of games. The player is issued with a starting balance and their final score is based on how much has been won when the time is up. Prizes can be awarded to top scorers. templateData.templateText: Nullam tristique ligula nec quam facilisis efficitur. Quisque felis lacus, dapibus id erat vitae, gravida rhoncus augue. Pellentesque sit amet felis eu quam convallis rutrum.
